HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: More hauling opportunities Vanilla requires a haulable be near your start position, and its stockpile near your job. Too far and it won't be hauled, even if it's directly in your path. We can do better. We prefer the proximity requirements set by vanilla, but relax them to find valid haulables. Adjustable for performance (see tooltips). Optimize hauling supplies If hauling supplies to storage would bring them closer to their blueprint, do that first (grabbing extra). • Support for Mehni's Pick Up And Haul!

Skip when bleeding Don't take jobs of opportunity when bleeding. "Optimize hauling" features still apply since they (hopefully) expedite a job. • Updated Optimize hauling supplies Now works as expected: instead of denying the inefficient supply job so some hauler eventually hauls, the builder themselves will.

• Hauls are substantially improved on the default "recommended" setting. No longer should distant wood cut or metal mined be neglected. (I've integrated the very last vanilla pathing check into this mod's magic.)
• Setting tooltips updated with detailed descriptions.

Haul to inventory Custom use of Pick Up And Haul! (Optional mod. Installed separately.) PUAH is carefully controlled so only items qualifying as opportunistic will be gathered. (Dedicated haul jobs behave as normal, gathering as much as they can.)

• New job descriptions: |img:jobReport|caption:If you don't see this, it's standard hauling or a different mod.| • Added Enabled setting for troubleshooting without restarts. • Improved settings and descriptions.
• Compatibility with KV's Infinite Storage: Optimize hauling supplies should now work instead of looping on storage and retrieval.
Optimize hauling ingredients If hauling ingredients to storage would bring them closer to their workbench, do that first (grabbing extra). Unticks similar setting in Common Sense mod.
• Fixed "Optimize hauling ingredients" to no longer cause "Standing" loop when incapable. (Missed a basic check vanilla already did in the "Optimize hauling supplies" scenario.)

• Fixed "Optimize hauling ingredients/supplies" to no longer cause "Standing" loop when ingredient is in a pawn inventory. Fixes surgery with Smart Medicine, compatibility with Build From Inventory, and others.
